Description: Black-topped pottery beaker vase, exterior coated with red and blackened slip and burnishing with diagonal strokes. .
Curator's comments: Bibliography: E. R. Ayrton & W. L. S. Loat, Pre-dynastic cemetery at El Mahasna (London, 1911), p. 12; pl. xxix.29e. Base is slipped and shows no evidence of wear. Marked H.97 on base
